verses.verse: Njoo, Roho Mtukufu uoshe moyo wangu, Utakase nia yangu, njoo, nijaze sasa.
verses.refrain: Roho Mtukufu, njoo, nijaze sasa; Utakase nia yangu, njoo, nijaze sasa.
verses.verse: Ujalize moyo wangu Ijapo sikuoni, Nami ninakuhitaji, njoo, nijaze sasa.
Nimejaa udhaifu, nainamia kwako; Roho Mtukufu sasa, nitilie na nguvu.
Unioshe, nifariji, niponye, nibariki, Unijaze moyo wangu: ndiwe mwenye uwezo.
